sentences.en: A cloud of fine spray came up from the waterfall.
sentences.cn: 飞瀑溅起一片水雾。

sentences.en: a new hair styling spray
sentences.cn: 一种新的定型喷发剂

sentences.en: a spray-on water repellent for shoes
sentences.cn: 喷涂式皮鞋防水剂

sentences.en: A sprayer hooked to a tractor can spray five gallons onto ten acres.
sentences.cn: 挂在拖拉机上的喷雾器用五加仑液量能喷洒十英亩地。

sentences.en: An aerosol spray will make short work of painting awkward objects.
sentences.cn: 用喷罐来喷涂，不好对付的物品也能轻松搞定。

sentences.en: Because of the immunity of the immature insects, it'simportant to spray regularly.
sentences.cn: 由于幼虫对药物有免疫力，因此必须经常喷药。

sentences.en: He doesn't spray against pests or diseases.
sentences.cn: 他并不喷药防虫祛病。

sentences.en: He spray-painted his name on the wall.
sentences.cn: 他把自己的名字用喷漆喷在了墙上。

sentences.en: Most farmers use pesticide sprays.
sentences.cn: 大多数农民都使用喷雾杀虫剂。

sentences.en: My face was stinging from the salt spray.
sentences.cn: 我的脸被盐雾刺痛了。

sentences.en: She sprayed hair spray in her eye by mistake.
sentences.cn: 她错把洗头水当成眼药水上到眼睛里了.

sentences.en: She sprayed herself with perfume.
sentences.cn: 她往身上喷了香水。

sentences.en: spray from the waves
sentences.cn: 海浪溅起的水雾

sentences.en: Spray rose up from the surface of the water.
sentences.cn: 水面溅起水花。

sentences.en: Spray the plants with insecticide.
sentences.cn: 给植物喷洒杀虫剂。

sentences.en: The moon was casting a rainbow through the spray from the waterfall.
sentences.cn: 月亮在瀑布溅起的水雾上照出了一道彩虹。

sentences.en: The officers blasted him with pepper spray.
sentences.cn: 警察用胡椒粉喷雾剂喷他。

sentences.en: The walls had been horribly vandalized with spray paint.
sentences.cn: 墙壁被用喷漆喷得一塌糊涂。

sentences.en: The walls have been horribly vandalized with spray paint.
sentences.cn: 墙上被人用喷漆涂得乱七八糟。

sentences.en: The youths are taught how to spray paint cars and mend fences.
sentences.cn: 教授年轻人如何给汽车喷漆和修理护栏。

sentences.en: We were dripping wet from the spray.
sentences.cn: 我们被水花打湿了。

words.tran_cn: 喷雾器；喷出水沫的人；洒水车

phrases.tran_cn: 鼻用喷雾，鼻喷入法；喷鼻剂
胡椒喷雾剂；胡椒粉喷笔；防狼喷雾
盐雾试验；盐水喷雾试验；中性盐雾试验
雾化试验，喷雾试验；喷淋防水性测试

trans.tran_cn: 水花，喷剂，喷水器，喷雾，小树枝，花簇
trans.tran_en: water in very small drops that is blown from the sea etc or sent up by vehicles on a wet road

trans.tran_cn: 喷，使飞溅，往…上撒扫射（子弹)，在…上喷涂料，喷农药，撒尿
trans.tran_en: to force liquid out of a container so that it comes out in a stream of very small drops and covers an area
to force liquid out of a container so that it comes out in a stream of very small drops and covers an area
Spray is a lot of small drops of water which are being thrown into the air
